ProductInfo.Features:
Versatile 14" touch-screen display for easy, intutive control at the touch of a finger.  10-point multi-touch support lets you use scroll with 2 fingers, and pinch, rotate and flip. LED backlighting permits a thinner and more energy-efficient screen.
Extra-large 6GB memory lets you run your most demanding programs. 500GB hard drive holds thousands of songs, photos and documents.
3rd Gen Intel® CoreTM i3 Processor. Microsoft® Windows® 8.  The very latest version of Windows.
Wireless-N (802.11n) for high-performance, cable-free networking.  Lets you access wireless networks to share files, surf the Web and exchange email. Fully compatible with 802.11b/g as well. High-speed wired networking is supported, too, via an Ethernet/VGA combination port.
Backlit keyboard lets you type in low light
ProductInfo.Name: Acer® Aspire V5-471P-6662 Laptop Computer With 14" Touch-Screen Display & 3rd Gen Intel® CoreTM i3 Processor, Silver
